name: MB Consultancy
tag_list: social-media, digital-marketing, digital-strategy, marketing, online, seo
overview:
Digital Marketing Consultancy specializing in social media, content creation and curation and integrating the offline with the online.

We are a digital marketing consultancy helping local and international brands grow and develop their digital presence.

Services include:

Digital Marketing Strategies Email marketing that integrates the online with the offline brand Blogging, social media and utilization of social networks to create awareness about the brand and build an online community Creation of Online PR content (newsletter, press releases, campaigns, competitions) Establishing an online community and social media presence for each client Online Reputation Management Managing all aspect of Search Engine Marketing (SEO and PPC) Website and logo design Monthly reporting, post campaign analysis, and optimizing campaigns based on the analysis of the results
